data.message: Facebook. Hi. I got a message from a friend claiming it was Facebook saying that if I didn't republish the message I'd be disconnected. I'm assuming it's a scam but just want to check with the officials thanks.

replies.message: Hey Anthony. Thanks for checking in with us. This sounds like a hoax message. If you see content like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1QZCI5T. Thanks! -Kate
Thanks Facebook guys! These "Facebook" scams seem to be getting popular eh?
